sentence: Perhaps Rep. Madison Cawthorn's revelation about GOP sex parties and cocaine use hit a little too close to home, because this is apparently where the rubber meets the road for Republicans.
title: As Republicans fret over Cawthorn's drugs and orgies revelation, Trump gives him a platform

sentence: Kraushaar wrote: Madison Cawthorn just filed his 1stQ fundraising report spent more than he raised and has less than 300K in bank.? According to New York Times political reporter Shane Goldmacher, Rep. Cawthorn has a lot less than even that in the bank.
title: Madison Cawthorn raised $3.5 million but seems to only have a little over $100K left
